Package edu.sru.group3.WebBasedEvaluations.service

Class AdminMethodsService

java.lang.Object
edu.sru.group3.WebBasedEvaluations.service.AdminMethodsService
@Service public class AdminMethodsService extends Object
This class provides all of the tools for the UserController and AddUserController classes that don't require the use of a html file/link tag
Author:
Dalton Stenzel

  • Constructor Details

    • AdminMethodsService

      public AdminMethodsService(UserRepository userRepository)
      Parameters:
      userRepository - is a user repository, contains list of users

  • Method Details

    • sortCheck

      public List<User> sortCheck(String sort, List<User> listTotal, Integer sortOr, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Method for for checking the sort type and then sends the value to an instance of the UserService in order to obtain a sorted list when given a sort, list, sort order, and model. A sorted list can be returned if a valid sort type is presented. The check is performed here and in the actual sorting method, so there is likely some redundancy here.
      Parameters:
      sort - is the type of sort: firstName, lastName, email, and role.
      listTotal - is the list sent to be sorted.
      sortOr - is the order the sort should be: ascending(1) or descending(0).
      model - is a Model object with no user here, likely left over from something else.
      Returns:
      a list that is likely sorted by a specific type and order.

    • capitalize

      public String capitalize(String word)
      Method for taking a String in order to capitalize the first character of the String.
      Parameters:
      word - is the String value to have its first character capitalized
      Returns:
      a String that is the "word" variable with the first character capitalized.

    • hasSpace

      public boolean hasSpace(String str)
      Method for checking if a given String has at least a single space.
      Parameters:
      str - is the String value given to be checked if it has a space in it or not.
      Returns:
      either true or false to confirm if the String has a space in it or not.

    • checkAndUpdate

      public boolean checkAndUpdate(User user)
      Method that checks the user information provided when adding users in order to check if they're empty, null, least than the length of 4 chars, or contain spaces when they shouldn't. It logs user information that caused the rejection.
      Parameters:
      user - is the user object that is attempting to be added to the data.
      Returns:
      true or false depending on if the user should be added.

    • adminUserPageItems

      public void adminUserPageItems(String ansr, String keyword, String mess, Integer perPage, org.springframework.ui.Model model, String sort, Integer currPage, Integer sortOr)
      Method for adding everything required in order to provide the admin user page with the content needed to be useful.
      Parameters:
      ansr - is a String value used for the attributes on the admin user page in order to provide an error/success message.
      keyword - is a String value that is provided by a user in order to display a list of users that have a relation to the word.
      mess - is a String that used for an attribute on the admin user page along side the ansr variable. "mess" contains the message.
      perPage - is an Integer value used to keep track of how many users will display per page.
      model - is a Model object that is needed to add attributes to a web page.
      sort - is a String that is used to determine what the sort type will be.
      currPage - is an Integer value used to keep track of what page the user is on.
      sortOr - is an Integer value used to determine whether the sort order will be ascending or descending, 1 and 0 respectively.

    • pageCalc

      public List<User> pageCalc(List<User> userList, Integer page, Integer perPage, String sort, String keyword, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Method for gathering the users that will display on the current page by making a new list, using a provided one as reference.
      Parameters:
      userList - is a list of users provided that will be used as reference for making a smaller list to be returned.
      page - is an Integer that holds the current page the user is on.
      perPage - is an Integer that holds the amount of users being displayed per page.
      sort - is a String that holds what type of sort will be used on the list.
      keyword - is a String that holds the specific set of characters searched for.
      model - is a Model object used to add attributes to the website.
      Returns:
      a list which contains the users to be displayed on the webpage.

    • comparingMethod

      public User comparingMethod(long id, User user, User user2, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Method for comparing changes between old and new changes for a user from the admin user edit page and add webpage attributes depending on if the user had changes applied or not. It logs the pre, attempted, and post changes of a user.
      Parameters:
      id - is a long used to hold the id of the user that's attempting to be updated.
      user - is a User object, specifically the user post-changes.
      user2 - is a User object, specifically the user pre-changes.
      model - is a Model object that is used to add attributes to the webpage.
      Returns:
      user2 with either user or user2 changes or a mix of both depending on what types of changes were attempted.
